bullets.item: The easiest way to add members to your project is to invite them by email. Just click on the pink user + icon in the bottom tray and invite away! Read more here.
Invite button will only be visible to the Project administrator(s) and the Mingle administrator(s).
Invite button will not be visible for a Mingle instance that has SSO configured.

subsection.title: Add from Project admin tab
subsection.p: You can also add members to your project from the Project admin tab by following these steps:

item.p: Click on Add team member link on the team management page.

You will be directed to a new page where you can make any existing users of the Mingle instance as team members of the current project. On this page, you can also search terms to find users you want to add.
Clicking on the Full link will add the selected user as a project member of the current project.
Clicking on the Read only link will add the selected user as a read only project member of the current project.
Now if you go back to project team member page you can verify that the selected users are listed as team members.
